replies.body:
You were penalized for your history of behavior. Not for this single game that you pulled out.

This includes the 10-game chat restriction, 25-game chat restriction, 14-day ban, and finally these 2 games given in your reform card.

You very recently returned from a 14-day ban and continued with the types of behavior that got you there.

Generally the games in your reform card start with the most severe to the least severe, where you were reported and found to be displaying unacceptable behavior as determined by the community. By picking game 2/2 you are ignoring the more severe case and instead placing all your focus on the second game. The fact of the matter is you would not have been penalized for the 2nd game alone, which is why you were allowed to play games after it.
